overview: Jeremiah began his career as a Technology Entrepreneur at the age of 11 when he started creating Apple Computer training manuals for teachers at the Norwalk-LaMirada Unified School District, where his father was a Bilingual Elementary School Teacher. From an early age, Jeremiah possessed a keen aptitude for a wide range of technologies and has since developed specialized expertise the in areas low-level systems programming, database architecture, digital security, web application development, and enterprise systems design. His expert knowledge, which includes emerging technologies, allows Jeremiah to spearhead innovative solutions that support the paradigm shift for businesses into the digital age. As one of the world’s leading security analysts, Jeremiah has also worked closely with Federal Government Agencies to adopt web application security best practices and enact legislation in the effort to maintain and uphold consumer privacy.
